title: Reflections on Macroeconomics Then and Now
content: For release on delivery  1:00 p.m. EST  March 7, 2016      Reflections on Macroeconomics Then and Now         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Policy Challenges in an Interconnected World”  32nd Annual National Association for Business Economics Economic Policy Conference     Washington, D.C.    March 7, 2016
